repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

body:
Fixes https://github.com/cython/cython/issues/3843

Final smaller part of https://github.com/cython/cython/pull/3845

--------

The most notable change here is that I made the cfunc wrappers use the name escaping mechanism that was already in `PyrexTypes.type_identifier`. This seemed more satisfactory than just replacing unknown characters with `_` (as was the status quo), and it's a tested mechanism used elsewhere in the code.

comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -229,3 +229,52 @@ def test_cdef_class_params(a, b):
     TypeError: Argument 'b' has incorrect type (expected cfunc_convert.B, got cfunc_convert.A)
     """
     return (<object>test_cdef_class_params_cfunc)(a, b)
+
+cdef void memoryview_func_a(double [:] x):
+    x[0] = 1
+
+cdef void memoryview_func_b(double [::1] x):
+    x[0] = 2
+
+cdef void memoryview_func_c(int [:] x):
+    x[0] = 1
+
+cdef void memoryview_func_d(int [:] x):
+    x[0] = 2
+
+cdef void memoryview_func_e(int [:,::1] x):
+    x[0,0] = 4
+
+cdef void memoryview_func_f(int [::1,:] x):
+    x[0,0] = 4
+
+
+

comment_data.body:
Let's avoid adding to the semantic ambiguity between `pyrex` and `for_display`.
```suggestion
        base_code = StringEncoding.EncodedString(
                        (str(self)) if pyrex or for_display else MemoryView.memviewslice_cname)
```
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -695,9 +695,9 @@ def is_complete(self):
     def declaration_code(self, entity_code,
             for_display = 0, dll_linkage = None, pyrex = 0):
         # XXX: we put these guards in for now...
-        assert not pyrex
         assert not dll_linkage
         from . import MemoryView
+        for_display = for_display or pyrex
         base_code = StringEncoding.EncodedString(
                         (str(self)) if for_display else MemoryView.memviewslice_cname)

commit.message: Allow wrappers to be generated for functions with memoryviews (3843)

Made memoryview declaration with pyrex match with for_display

Also added some extra tests

milestone.description:
Goals:
– New version scheme: 3.x instead of 0.x.
– Change default `language_level` from `2` to `3`.
– Change default for `binding` directive from `False` to `True`.
– Fix some Python compatibility issues (if possible, allowing for breaking changes).

title: Allow creation of wrappers for cdef functions with memoryviews
